short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adjust opacity and switch to grayscale mode to stay focused and reduce visual distractions while browsing.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Adjust opacity and switch to grayscale mode to stay focused and reduce visual distractions while browsing.

This extension allows you to customize the appearance of any webpage with two main features:

• Opacity Control: Adjust the transparency of the webpage using an intuitive slider.
• Black and White Mode: Instantly toggle a grayscale filter across the entire page.

Features:

Simple and easy-to-use interface
Changes persist across sessions
Works on all tabs
Instant application of effects
No invasive permissions required

Perfect for:

Reducing brightness on overly bright pages
Creating a more comfortable reading environment
Personalizing your browsing experience
Enhancing visual accessibility"
